section.48: The Book Pertaining to the Remembrance of Allah, Supplication, Repentance and Seeking Forgiveness

hadiths.text: Farwa' b. Naufal Ashja'i reported:I asked: 'A'isha, in what words did Allah's Messenger (ï·º) supplicate Allah? She said that he used to utter:" I seek refuge in Thee from the evil of what I did and from the evil of what I did not
